attributes.action: ensure that political parties are not funded by the state.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the scandal regarding possible cash for peerages political parties should not be funded by the state. Why should extremist parties which get hardly any votes get tax payers money? If a political organisation needs funds it should have policies which don't disenfranchise the voters then they would get donations directly from them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
